snippet: A man was struck as he crossed 51st Street at Third Avenue in Sunset Park around 7 p.m. The driver was charged with leaving the scene of an accident.
abstract: A man was struck as he crossed 51st Street at Third Avenue in Sunset Park around 7 p.m. The driver was charged with leaving the scene of an accident.

headline.main: 31-Year-Old Killed in a Brooklyn Hit and Run
